c:attribute.name: lockDevices
c:attribute.description: The addresses of door locks defined at this place

c:attribute.name: motorizedDoorDevices
c:attribute.description: The addresses of motorized doors defined at this place

c:attribute.name: contactSensorDevices
c:attribute.description: The addresses of contact sensors defined at this place

c:attribute.name: petDoorDevices
c:attribute.description: The addresses of pet doors defined at this place

c:attribute.name: warnings
c:attribute.description: A set of warnings about devices which have potential issues that could cause an alarm to be missed. The key is the address of the device with a warning and the value is an I18N code with the description of the problem.

c:attribute.name: unlockedLocks
c:attribute.description: The addresses of door locks that are currently unlocked

c:attribute.name: offlineLocks
c:attribute.description: The addresses of door locks that are currently offline

c:attribute.name: jammedLocks
c:attribute.description: The addresses of door locks that are currently jammed

c:attribute.name: openMotorizedDoors
c:attribute.description: The addresses of motorized doors that are currently open

c:attribute.name: offlineMotorizedDoors
c:attribute.description: The addresses of motorized doors that are currently offline

c:attribute.name: obstructedMotorizedDoors
c:attribute.description: The addresses of motorized doors that are currently obstructed

c:attribute.name: openContactSensors
c:attribute.description: The addressees of currently open contact sensors

c:attribute.name: offlineContactSensors
c:attribute.description: The addresses of currently offline contact sensors

c:attribute.name: unlockedPetDoors
c:attribute.description: The addresses of currently locked pet doors

c:attribute.name: autoPetDoors
c:attribute.description: The addresses of pet doors in auto mode

c:attribute.name: offlinePetDoors
c:attribute.description: The addresses of offline pet doors

c:attribute.name: allPeople
c:attribute.description: The set of all people at the place that could be assigned to a lock (those with access and a pin)

c:attribute.name: authorizationByLock
c:attribute.description: A between a door lock and the people that currently have access to that lock

c:attribute.name: chimeConfig
c:attribute.description: The set of all that could have a chiming enabled/disabled.

c:method.name: AuthorizePeople
c:method.description: Authorizes the given people on the lock. Any people that previously existed on the lock not in this set will be deauthorized

c:parameter.name: device
c:parameter.description: The address of the door lock to disassociate/associate people with

c:parameter.name: operations
c:parameter.description: The set of people to assign to the door lock

c:return.name: changesPending
c:return.description: true if there are changes pending, false if no changes were required

c:method.name: SynchAuthorization
c:method.description: Synchronizes the access on the device and the service, by clearing all pins and reassociating people that should have access

c:parameter.name: device
c:parameter.description: The address of the device to synchronize

c:event.name: PersonAuthorized
c:event.description: Emitted from the subsystem when a person is authorized on a lock

c:parameter.name: lock
c:parameter.description: address of the lock the person was authorized on

c:event.name: PersonDeauthorized
c:event.description: Emitted from the subsystem when a person is deauthorized from a lock

c:parameter.name: lock
c:parameter.description: address of the lock the person was deauthorized from

c:event.name: LockJammed
c:event.description: Emitted when a door lock is jammed.

c:parameter.name: lock
c:parameter.description: Address of the door lock that is jammed.

c:event.name: LockUnjammed
c:event.description: Emitted when a door lock is no longer jammed.

c:parameter.name: lock
c:parameter.description: Address of the door lock that is no longer jammed.

c:event.name: MotorizedDoorObstructed
c:event.description: Emitted when a motorized door is obstructed.

c:parameter.name: door
c:parameter.description: Address of the motorized door that is obstructed.

c:event.name: MotorizedDoorUnobstructed
c:event.description: Emitted when a motorized door is no longer obstructed.

c:parameter.name: door
c:parameter.description: Address of the motorized door that is no longer obstructed.
